mapper.select: SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.cover,ec.price,ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum,et.`name`AS teacherName, es.title AS subjectLevelOne,est.title AS subjectLevelTwo FROM edu_course ec LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ec.id = ecd.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id =et.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es ON ec.subject_parent_id = es.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject est ON ec.subject_id = est.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId};
